summary: La Segunda Temporada De Aggretsuko Con Fecha En Netflix #Aggretsuko #Netflix
title: La Segunda Temporada De Aggretsuko Con Fecha En Netflix #Aggretsuko #Netflix
body:
La Segunda Temporada De Aggretsuko Con Fecha En Netflix #Aggretsuko #Netflix

Netflix anunció la fecha de salida de la segunda temporada de Aggretsuko. No esperaremos mucho por el retorno de la panda roja fan del death metal.

Se tardó un poco, pero al fin la segunda temporada de Aggretsuko tiene una fecha de estreno firme en Netflix. Ésta fue revelada la noche de este lunes a través del tráiler que acompaña esta nota. De acuerdo a los planes, será el 14 de junio que…

View On WordPress

blog.name: newsintheshell
blog.title: News In The Shell
blog.description: Blog dedicato interamente ad anime, manga e affini, sempre aggiornato con news dal Giappone e con un occhio di riguardo per le piattaforme di streaming ufficiale, le uscite home video e gli eventi del panorama italiano!

summary: Aggretsuko, svelata con un video la data di uscita della seconda stagione
title: Aggretsuko, svelata con un video la data di uscita della seconda stagione
body:
Già disponibili su Netflix la prima stagione e lo special natalizio.

Netflix ha svelato oggi che l’annunciata seconda stagione di “Aggretsuko” (Aggressive Retsuko), miniserie incentrata su un personaggio di Sanrio, approderà sulla piattaforma il 14 giugno di quest’anno. Di seguito il trailer diffuso in occasione dell’annuncio. 

Rareko torna a dirigere e sceneggiare l’anime presso lo studio Fanworks. La prima stagione di 10 episodi ha fatto il suo debutto su Netflix il 20 aprile 2018, mentre il 20 dicembre dell’anno scorso è stato aggiunto in catalogo lo special natalizio intitolato “Aggretsuko: Buon Metallo e Buon Anno”. Entrambi sono disponibili sia doppiati che sottotitolati in italiano.

Insoddisfatta del suo lavoro d'ufficio, nel tempo libero il panda rosso Retsuko affronta le sfide quotidiane cantando a squarciagola canzoni death metal al karaoke.

Prima della partnership con la celebre piattaforma di streaming, una prima serie di corti, della durata di un minuto, è andata in onda su TBS nella primavera del 2016.     

SilenziO)))

[FONTE]
body_abstract: Già disponibili su Netflix la prima stagione e lo special natalizio.

blog.name: kingdomofkitten
blog.title: Jacob A.K.A. KingdomOfKitten
blog.description:
I write sometimes. I think that says a lot about my career choices.

My Twitter: https://twitter.com/KingdomOfKitten

My Letterboxd: https://letterboxd.com/kingdomofkitten/

title: The Wedding: Epilogue: The Honeymoon
body:
*some time later, in a hotel in Okinawa, late at night…*

Retsuko: *washing her face in the bathroom, and then drying it off with a towel* Ahhhh…I needed that. *grabs her ring, and puts it back on, before walking out, to see her new husband sitting on the bed, checking his phone* Whatcha looking at?

Haida: Ah, just some photos I took from the reception. Got this rather flattering pic of Fenneko. *shows Retsuko a photo of Fenneko showing both middle fingers to the camera, and sticking her tongue out*

Retsuko: *chuckles* Ah, always a charmer, that gal.

Haida: Yeah. *scoots over, to let Retsuko sit next to him* Speaking of, she got my phone, and took this while we were dancing. *shows a photo of the two, slow dancing, and looking at each other, happily*

Retsuko: Aww! You were just so handsome in that suit.

Haida: Eh, I’d say you were the better looking of us there.

Retsuko: Oh, stop. ^^ *they then see a picture of Ikari with a ginormous grin on his face, and food all over his mouth* *GAAASP!* AWWW! *covers her mouth* Haida, why did I give birth to such a cutie? Why? It’s not fair, he’s cuter than both of us!

Haida: I know, I know. Speaking of, I need to text Fenneko, ask if Ikari was put to bed yet. *texts her* … *gets a text back*

Fenneko: *text* Snug as a bug in a rug. *sends a photo of Ikari fast asleep in his bed*

Retsuko and Haida: Awww…

Retsuko: I miss him already…

Haida: Hey, we’ll be back in a few days! Don’t worry, we’ll see him again soon. :)

Retsuko: I guess. *they go back through the photos, see her parents and Haida’s, with bottles of Sake* Ah, there’s my parents! They look so happy to be there! And yours, too!

Haida: Looks like they all took the same philosophy: any event, good or bad, just drink up!

Retsuko: I always wondered where we got that from.

Haida: Now we know. *finds a photo of the wedding cake, with Kabae sneaking off some pieces* Ha!

Retsuko: Give those back, you thief! *they find a selfie from Tsunoda, AND a thigh pic* Oooof course.

Haida: Yeah, Fenneko can keep those to herself. *sees a photo of Resasuke* Hey, it’s Space Cadet! Always good to see him.

Retsuko: Yeah. Honestly, he dressed up pretty nicely for this!

Haida: *with a smirk* Just a shame about him being your-

Retsuko: *turns very stern* Do you WANT a super quick divorce?

Haida: *gets scared, and reverts back* Right, sorry. *finds a photo of himself and Ryuu, wearing shades, and doing some cool poses* Ah, just a couple of boys out and about!

Retsuko: You two a bunch of cool guys now?

Haida: We were always a bunch of cool guys, he just had to find it in him, and accept it.

Retsuko: Hmhm….actually, that does remind me, I was wanting to ask you about something. Something that has kind of been on my mind for a while, and I really started thinking about it when you were talking with Ryuu.

Haida: Oh? *puts his phone down* What is it, honey?

Retsuko: …how do I put this…I’ve been finding that taking care of Ikari has been a truly rewarding experience for me. It just gives me a bunch of joy knowing that I can be his mother, and it kinda puts me in a bit of a high that I hope I get to be in for a good while. Not only that, but you chatting with Ryuu, especially about being younger brothers and having big siblings sort of made me think about our own family a bit, and how it could always grow…

Haida: …grow?

Retsuko: …what I’m trying to say is…well, not right NOW, one little rascal is enough for me right now. Ikari gives me plenty to work with.

Haida: Heh, you and me both.

Retsuko: But! When he gets just a little older, like, 4 or 5, maybe 6…..you wanna….try for another baby?

Haida: ….what?

Retsuko: Y-you know, have another kid, turn Ikari into a big brother, stuff like that…I mean, that’s what I was thinking, I’m not sure about you. If you don’t want to, that’s fine, I gue-

Haida: Of course I want to! :D

Retsuko: …huh?

Haida: Being a dad has been, though definitely tiresome, honestly pretty fun! It’s a responsibility I like to have, especially with you. So, if it’s something you want, I would love to make this family a little bit bigger. :)

Retsuko: …aw, thank you, honey! *kiss him* I was just worried you might consider it too much to handle.

Haida: Me? Nah, I’ll take a hundred kids!

Retsuko: *laughs* Is that so? How about 50 thousand?

Haida: How about an actual challenge? ;) *the two laugh, before kissing once again* Mmmmm~ *breaks the kiss* But yeah, if you want to have another kid soon, we can do that. I’m down.

Retsuko: Awesome! *stretches, and yawns* Well, I don’t know about you, but I am pooped! Had a long day today.

Haida: Same. *the two crawl into bed, where he notices the side she’s sleeping on is the side where the window outside is, and as a result, the moonlight is shining on her* …. *smiling lovingly*

Retsuko: …hmhmhm, what are you looking at?

Haida: Ah, not much. Just more evidence that I married one of the most beautiful women in the entire universe.

Retsuko: *her face goes bright red* Darn it, Haida! Why must you always say stuff like that?! >///<

Haida: I say it because I believe it’s true! You may not see it, but every time I think I am finally getting over how you are, there’s something new about you that just takes my breath away. It’s not my fault you’re pretty much just perfection bottled up in a red panda.

Retsuko: Oooooh, you! I am tired as hell right now, but I’ll just let you know, you and I are gonna have some sex in the morning.

Haida: I can’t wait! *grabs a box of condoms* Came prepared!

Retsuko: Wonderful!

Haida: Yeah….good night, Retsuko. I love you.

Retsuko: Good night, I love you too…hubby~ <3

*The two cuddle up, and fall asleep in each others’ arms, now enjoying life, as a married couple. Who knows what kind of ups and downs they will now have to endure? They certainly don’t know. But they’re willing to take it on. But until then, they must sleep…*

AND WITH THAT, THE WEDDING ARC IS NOW OVER!

Thank you all for joining along!

What next?

….I dunno, probably some silly filler stuff. I need something short and cute, as opposed to long and cute. :T

Haida: How about an actual challenge? ;) *the two laugh, before kissing once again* Mmmmm~ *breaks the kiss* But yeah, if you want to have another kid soon, we can do that. I’m down.

Retsuko: Awesome! *stretches, and yawns* Well, I don’t know about you, but I am pooped! Had a long day today.

Haida: Same. *the two crawl into bed, where he notices the side she’s sleeping on is the side where the window outside is, and as a result, the moonlight is shining on her* …. *smiling lovingly*

Retsuko: …hmhmhm, what are you looking at?

Haida: Ah, not much. Just more evidence that I married one of the most beautiful women in the entire universe.

Retsuko: *her face goes bright red* Darn it, Haida! Why must you always say stuff like that?! >///<

Haida: I say it because I believe it’s true! You may not see it, but every time I think I am finally getting over how you are, there’s something new about you that just takes my breath away. It’s not my fault you’re pretty much just perfection bottled up in a red panda.

Retsuko: Oooooh, you! I am tired as hell right now, but I’ll just let you know, you and I are gonna have some sex in the morning.

Haida: I can’t wait! *grabs a box of condoms* Came prepared!

Retsuko: Wonderful!

Haida: Yeah….good night, Retsuko. I love you.

Retsuko: Good night, I love you too…hubby~ <3

*The two cuddle up, and fall asleep in each others’ arms, now enjoying life, as a married couple. Who knows what kind of ups and downs they will now have to endure? They certainly don’t know. But they’re willing to take it on. But until then, they must sleep…*

AND WITH THAT, THE WEDDING ARC IS NOW OVER!

Thank you all for joining along!

What next?

….I dunno, probably some silly filler stuff. I need something short and cute, as opposed to long and cute. :T
trail.content:
*some time later, in a hotel in Okinawa, late at night…*

Retsuko: *washing her face in the bathroom, and then drying it off with a towel* Ahhhh…I needed that. *grabs her ring, and puts it back on, before walking out, to see her new husband sitting on the bed, checking his phone* Whatcha looking at?

Haida: Ah, just some photos I took from the reception. Got this rather flattering pic of Fenneko. *shows Retsuko a photo of Fenneko showing both middle fingers to the camera, and sticking her tongue out*

Retsuko: *chuckles* Ah, always a charmer, that gal.

Haida: Yeah. *scoots over, to let Retsuko sit next to him* Speaking of, she got my phone, and took this while we were dancing. *shows a photo of the two, slow dancing, and looking at each other, happily*

Retsuko: Aww! You were just so handsome in that suit.

Haida: Eh, I’d say you were the better looking of us there.

Retsuko: Oh, stop. ^^ *they then see a picture of Ikari with a ginormous grin on his face, and food all over his mouth* *GAAASP!* AWWW! *covers her mouth* Haida, why did I give birth to such a cutie? Why? It’s not fair, he’s cuter than both of us!

Haida: I know, I know. Speaking of, I need to text Fenneko, ask if Ikari was put to bed yet. *texts her* … *gets a text back*

Fenneko: *text* Snug as a bug in a rug. *sends a photo of Ikari fast asleep in his bed*

Retsuko and Haida: Awww…

Retsuko: I miss him already…

Haida: Hey, we’ll be back in a few days! Don’t worry, we’ll see him again soon. :)

Retsuko: I guess. *they go back through the photos, see her parents and Haida’s, with bottles of Sake* Ah, there’s my parents! They look so happy to be there! And yours, too!

Haida: Looks like they all took the same philosophy: any event, good or bad, just drink up!

Retsuko: I always wondered where we got that from.

Haida: Now we know. *finds a photo of the wedding cake, with Kabae sneaking off some pieces* Ha!

Retsuko: Give those back, you thief! *they find a selfie from Tsunoda, AND a thigh pic* Oooof course.

Haida: Yeah, Fenneko can keep those to herself. *sees a photo of Resasuke* Hey, it’s Space Cadet! Always good to see him.

Retsuko: Yeah. Honestly, he dressed up pretty nicely for this!

Haida: *with a smirk* Just a shame about him being your-

Retsuko: *turns very stern* Do you WANT a super quick divorce?

Haida: *gets scared, and reverts back* Right, sorry. *finds a photo of himself and Ryuu, wearing shades, and doing some cool poses* Ah, just a couple of boys out and about!

Retsuko: You two a bunch of cool guys now?

Haida: We were always a bunch of cool guys, he just had to find it in him, and accept it.

Retsuko: Hmhm….actually, that does remind me, I was wanting to ask you about something. Something that has kind of been on my mind for a while, and I really started thinking about it when you were talking with Ryuu.

Haida: Oh? *puts his phone down* What is it, honey?

Retsuko: …how do I put this…I’ve been finding that taking care of Ikari has been a truly rewarding experience for me. It just gives me a bunch of joy knowing that I can be his mother, and it kinda puts me in a bit of a high that I hope I get to be in for a good while. Not only that, but you chatting with Ryuu, especially about being younger brothers and having big siblings sort of made me think about our own family a bit, and how it could always grow…

Haida: …grow?

Retsuko: …what I’m trying to say is…well, not right NOW, one little rascal is enough for me right now. Ikari gives me plenty to work with.

Haida: Heh, you and me both.

Retsuko: But! When he gets just a little older, like, 4 or 5, maybe 6…..you wanna….try for another baby?

Haida: ….what?

Retsuko: Y-you know, have another kid, turn Ikari into a big brother, stuff like that…I mean, that’s what I was thinking, I’m not sure about you. If you don’t want to, that’s fine, I gue-

Haida: Of course I want to! :D

Retsuko: …huh?

Haida: Being a dad has been, though definitely tiresome, honestly pretty fun! It’s a responsibility I like to have, especially with you. So, if it’s something you want, I would love to make this family a little bit bigger. :)

Retsuko: …aw, thank you, honey! *kiss him* I was just worried you might consider it too much to handle.

Haida: Me? Nah, I’ll take a hundred kids!

Retsuko: *laughs* Is that so? How about 50 thousand?

Haida: How about an actual challenge? ;) *the two laugh, before kissing once again* Mmmmm~ *breaks the kiss* But yeah, if you want to have another kid soon, we can do that. I’m down.

Retsuko: Awesome! *stretches, and yawns* Well, I don’t know about you, but I am pooped! Had a long day today.

Haida: Same. *the two crawl into bed, where he notices the side she’s sleeping on is the side where the window outside is, and as a result, the moonlight is shining on her* …. *smiling lovingly*

Retsuko: …hmhmhm, what are you looking at?

Haida: Ah, not much. Just more evidence that I married one of the most beautiful women in the entire universe.

Retsuko: *her face goes bright red* Darn it, Haida! Why must you always say stuff like that?! >///<

Haida: I say it because I believe it’s true! You may not see it, but every time I think I am finally getting over how you are, there’s something new about you that just takes my breath away. It’s not my fault you’re pretty much just perfection bottled up in a red panda.

Retsuko: Oooooh, you! I am tired as hell right now, but I’ll just let you know, you and I are gonna have some sex in the morning.

Haida: I can’t wait! *grabs a box of condoms* Came prepared!

Retsuko: Wonderful!

Haida: Yeah….good night, Retsuko. I love you.

Retsuko: Good night, I love you too…hubby~ <3

*The two cuddle up, and fall asleep in each others’ arms, now enjoying life, as a married couple. Who knows what kind of ups and downs they will now have to endure? They certainly don’t know. But they’re willing to take it on. But until then, they must sleep…*

AND WITH THAT, THE WEDDING ARC IS NOW OVER!

Thank you all for joining along!

What next?

….I dunno, probably some silly filler stuff. I need something short and cute, as opposed to long and cute. :T

summary: Netflix Offers First Look At Aggretsuko Season 2!
title: Netflix Offers First Look At Aggretsuko Season 2!
body:
Netflix Offers First Look At Aggretsuko Season 2! #Aggretsuko #Anime #Neflix #Sanrio

Ready to let your rage out!? Netflix’s twitter account has given us the first look of the second season of the smash hit Aggretsuko!

https://twitter.com/NXOnNetflix/status/1130639352864706560

Showing Retsuko, her friends, and someone who looks like they can be her mother, it looks like we are in store for even more death metal fun.

Aggretsuko season 2 will hit Netflix June 14th!

summary: Aggretsuko Season 2 Launches on Netflix on 6/14/2019
title: Aggretsuko Season 2 Launches on Netflix on 6/14/2019
body:
Aggretsuko Season 2 Launches on Netflix on 6/14/2019

Earlier today, Netflix announced that Aggretsuko‘s second season will launch on their platform on June 14. Like the first season, the title will be presented as a Netflix Original.

Rarecho will return to direct and write the new season.

Netflix describes the new season as:

Everyone’s favorite death metal panda is back! Retsuko will return to Netflix for Aggretsuko Season 2. Produced by Fanworks…

View On WordPress

summary: Kidrobot Reveals their San Diego Comic-Con 2019 Exclusives and Pre-sale
title: Kidrobot Reveals their San Diego Comic-Con 2019 Exclusives and Pre-sale
body:
Kidrobot Reveals their San Diego Comic-Con 2019 Exclusives and Pre-sale #SDCC #SDCC50 #SDCC2019 #SDCC19

Kidrobot heads to San Diego Comic Con 2019 (July 18th – 21st) at Booth #2846 with limited edition exclusives for Aggretsuko, Godzilla, SpongeBob SquarePants, and a Chia Pet Dunny. 

Kidrobot will make all figures available for pre-sale on May 22-24. Limited quantities for each figure will release at 10am MST on each day. All figures will also be available for purchase on the show floor at…

summary: The Aggretsuko Season 2 Trailer is hidden on Netflix.
title: The Aggretsuko Season 2 Trailer is hidden on Netflix.
body:
An Instagram friend found it under the “Trailers and More” watch at your own risk.

Spoilers below

this is clearly the donkey guy taunting Haida and Haida getting super pissed

you see a lot of keyboard typing and at first I thought it was haida but then I saw that weird limo shot and it’s clearly donkey guy

sexy doggo girl appears in one shot.

At first I thought it was haida but look at his muzzle, donkey guy again and red shirts like that with that close shot, most of the times is not done to show a character under a positive light.

Donkey boy is clearly interested in Retsuko

aaaaaaand this is the weird limo scene, just look inside, there’s files and papers everywhere.

donkey guy with wine

Yeen boi ANGRY

they’re on a date

and then we see this, this is another shot that makes me question if he’s a good guy that smile….he’s clearly talking to someone

then this…. this is not good

and then finally, the money shot. it only appears for just one second but he’s IN the limo

I honestly think he’s a company spy and he’s going to seduce and manipulate her for info. I mean, look at that limo, that’s not normal. I am worried but also excited, this might be a very dark season.
